pop up.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Click here, and a list of files will pop up.
Her name keeps popping up in the newspapers.
pop up.translation[2].definitions[0].def: a window, often containing an advertisement, that suddenly appears on a computer screen, especially when you are looking at a website
pop up.translation[2].definitions[1].def: a restaurant, bar, shop etc that is opened somewhere for a short, limited period of time
pop up.translation[3].definitions[0].def: a small window containing an advertisement that suddenly appears on a computer screen when you are looking at a website
pop up.translation[4].definitions[0].def: a pop-up window or advertisement appears suddenly on a computer screen while you are using it
